Inferno paces around the base very upset.
Inferno: I can't believe I have to serve Megatron again. Why didn't Hell 
Beast let me go with him? Well I guess I better do something. My Queen 
(megatron) is there anything I can do for you?
Rampage: Likewise here, but I want give you my spark.
Scourge goes to his comp to try and find a way to destroy the CF.
Scourge: We must find away to destroy the Cybertronian Fire. Its sheilds are 
state of the art seeing how we had little affect on it. We must develope a 
new weapon of some kind or make this base fully operational once again. But 
how??.........
